casebody.data:
Monday, March 18, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

01-1084. Miller v. Ohio Dept. of Transp.

Erie App. No. E-99-082. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Erie County. Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae, city of Sandusky, to participate in oral argument scheduled for April 10, 2002,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to participate in oral argument be, and hereby is, granted, and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellants.
